column4: anyone have an idea why 6.06 desktop version hangs during installation within win32 vmware @ the time screen (2 of 6)

anyone have an idea why 6.06 desktop version hangs during installation within win32 vmware @ the time screen (2 of 6)?  it wont let me click next or back and the cd-rom is still reading (1 hour later)
